abstract: Greg D. Andres was deputy assistant attorney general for the criminal division and spent nearly a decade at the United States attorney’s office in Brooklyn.
snippet: Greg D. Andres was deputy assistant attorney general for the criminal division and spent nearly a decade at the United States attorney’s office in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Greg D. Andres, a senior Justice Department official, is leaving the government to join the law firm Davis Polk & Wardwell, according to two people with direct knowledge of his move.

headline.main: Justice Department Official to Join Davis Polk Law Firm
